item.title: APPENDIX B
item.description: SYNOPSIS OF PARALLEL PASSAGES SHOWING THE RELATION OF THE MANTRApāṭha TO THE VEDIC SAMHITĀS. p.Pratika, indicates that the MSS. of the Mantrapāṭha give the Pratika only. item.title: INDEX OF MANTRAS
item.description:
An asterisk indicates that the MSS. give only the Pratika of the Mantra. अँशस्ते हस्तं II, 39.
